name:
Animal Crossing™: New Leaf:
Update
description:
Update your game to Animal Crossing: New Leaf Welcome amiibo!

A software update is now available that introduces new features and adjustments to enhance the overall experience.

Update contents:
- Introduces amiibo compatibility
- New area added: campground
- Two minigames added: Animal Crossing Puzzle League and Desert Island Escape
- amiibo Camera feature added
- Additional furniture, characters and events introduced
- It is now possible to arrange furniture using the Touch Screen
- Secret storeroom added, allowing you to store more items
- Introduces additional enhancements to improve the user’s experience and enjoyment
- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.
